class.name: CSGCapsule3D
class.description: This node allows you to create a capsule for use with the CSG system. [b]Note:[/b] CSG nodes are intended to be used for level prototyping. Creating CSG nodes has a significant CPU cost compared to creating a [MeshInstance3D] with a [PrimitiveMesh]. Moving a CSG node within another CSG node also has a significant CPU cost, so it should be avoided during gameplay.

members.member: The number of sides of the capsule, the higher this number the more detail there will be in the capsule.
Number of horizontal slices for the capsule.
